description: Below are steps to take to report wife inheritance
title: Who to call: Wife inheritance cases
content:
1.        Report the matter to the Criminal Investigation Department of the nearest police station.
2.        Report the matter to the Local Council leaders who will address the matter. If the Local Council leaders do not help, report the matter to the sub-county chief who can also preside over and resolve the matter. 
3.        Contact women organizations like  Uganda Association of Women Lawyers (FIDA) who could provide more advice and support. 
4.        Educate members of the family about the legal position regarding this issue in order to help them deal with it better.
5.        Contact BarefootLaw for more information
